item.title: H&M 公司两年来首次发行债券，取得丰厚收益
item.description: 快速时尚零售商 Hennes & Mauritz AB 正在为两年来的首次债券销售做准备，而就在几周前，该公司因季度盈利好于预期而股价大涨。【原文：Fast-fashion retailer Hennes & Mauritz AB is lining up its first bond sale in two years, just weeks after its shares surged following better-than-expected quarterly earnings.】

item.title: VIX 曲线的 "扭结 "显示出对特朗普与习近平会晤的焦虑
item.description: 10月底，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）和中国国家主席习近平（Xi Jinping）将举行会晤。【原文：Flaring trade tensions have options traders piling into protection against big stock-market swings in late October, when US President Donald Trump and Chinese President Xi Jinping are set to meet.】

item.title: 美国传讯 Builder.ai 前首席财务官，要求其提供与审计师的通信记录
item.description: 美国调查人员正在推进对Builder.ai的刑事调查，要求该公司一名前高管在6月破产前与该公司的英国审计师以及参与该人工智能初创公司财务报告的其他人员进行沟通。【原文：US investigators are advancing a criminal probe into Builder.ai, demanding a former executive’s communications with the firm’s UK auditor and with others involved in the financial reporting for the artificial intelligence startup ahead of its June bankruptcy.】

item.title: 苏丹裁决引发代价高昂的和解风险后，法国国家巴黎银行股价暴跌
item.description: 法国巴黎银行（BNP Paribas SA）在一宗法庭案件中败诉，在巴黎交易市场跌至六个月来的最低点，分析师称，该案件可能导致代价高昂的和解。【原文：BNP Paribas SA fell to a six-month low in Paris trading after losing a court case that analysts said could result in a costly settlement.】

item.title: 特朗普与习近平会晤前中国对美稀土永磁出口下滑
item.description: 中国对美国和欧盟的稀土磁铁出货量在 9 月份有所下降，而在世界前两大经济体之间的贸易谈判风波中，中国政府加大了出口限制力度，从而加剧了紧张局势。【原文：China’s shipments of rare-earth magnets to the US and the European Union dropped in September, before Beijing escalated tensions by ramping up export curbs amid stormy trade talks between the world’s top two economies.】

item.title: 对冲基金 Enko Capital 为非洲募集私人信贷基金
item.description: Enko Capital 是一家专注于非洲的对冲基金，已为其针对中型企业的私人信贷战略筹集了 1 亿美元。【原文：Enko Capital, an Africa-focused hedge fund, has raised $100 million for its private credit strategy for mid-sized firms.】

item.title: KKR 推出海事租赁平台，认捐 5 亿美元
item.description: 另类资产管理公司 KKR & Co. 将首次推出海运集装箱租赁平台，其资产融资战略已投入 5 亿美元资金。【原文：Alternative asset manager KKR & Co. is debuting a marine container leasing platform, with $500 million in capital already committed from its asset-based finance strategy.】

item.title: 针对社交媒体公司的 "大规模法律围攻 "迫在眉睫
item.description: 数以千计的原告投诉、数百万页的内部文件和无数小时的取证记录即将进入美国法庭，威胁着最大社交媒体公司的未来。【原文：Thousands of plaintiffs’ complaints, millions of pages of internal documents and transcripts of countless hours of depositions are about to land in US courtrooms, threatening the future of the biggest social media companies.】

item.title: 土耳其免税政策转变将冲击 84 家重仓股基金
item.description: 根据彭博社审查的一项影响分析，土耳其取消对某些共同基金免征预扣税的计划将对管理着约 710 亿里拉（21 亿美元）的 84 家基金产生影响。【原文：Turkey’s plan to scrap a withholding tax exemption on certain mutual funds will impact 84 funds managing about 71 billion liras ($2.1 billion), according to an impact analysis reviewed by Bloomberg.】

item.title: AWS 服务中断，数千人报告问题
item.description: 周一上午，亚马逊网络服务遭遇大面积中断，其他平台的服务也受到影响。【原文：Amazon Web Services suffered a widespread disruption on Monday morning that affected services on other platforms.】

item.title: 尼日利亚国内债务的高收益率有望维持需求
item.description: 高收益率和奈拉的稳定性维持了投资者对尼日利亚国内债务的兴趣，预计随着通胀降温，央行只会逐步放宽借贷成本。【原文：High yields and the stability of the naira are seen maintaining investor interest in domestic Nigerian debt, with the central bank expected to only gradually ease borrowing costs as inflation cools.】

item.title: <strong>拉古拉姆-拉詹谈黄金飙升和金融稳定面临的日益增长的风险</strong
item.description:
一位前中央银行行长的观点

【原文：

The perspective of a former central banker

】

item.title: 奇货可居：拉詹谈日益增长的金融稳定风险（播客）
item.description: 黄金一直在飙升。风险资产（有一些小插曲）也一直在飙升。然而，央行行长们（尤其是美联储）却在降息。这是为什么呢？又是什么风险在作祟？在本期播客中，我们采访了芝加哥大学布斯商学院教授、印度储备银行前行长拉古拉姆-拉詹。拉詹是在金融大危机之前最早发出警报的人之一，他的名声非常响亮。【原文：Gold has been surging. Risky assets (with a few minor hiccups) have also been surging. And yet, central bankers (most notably the Fed) are in rate cutting mode. Why is this? And what kind of risks are being conjured up? On this episode of the podcast, we speak with Raghuram Rajan, a professor at the Booth School of Business at the University of Chicago, as well as the former Governor of the Reserve Bank of India. Rajan famously was one of the first to raise alarms prior to the Great Financial Cr】

item.title: 越南股市因债券违规问题创四月以来最大跌幅
item.description: 监管机构公布检查结果后，企业违规发行债券问题再次引发关注，越南股市因此创下六个月来最大跌幅。【原文：Vietnamese stocks plunged by the most in six months amid a reemergence of concerns over corporate bond issuance violations following the release of inspection results from regulators.】

item.title: 投资者大卫-马丁内斯祝贺萨瓦德尔抵御 BBVA
item.description: 萨瓦德尔银行（Banco Sabadell SA）股东大卫-马丁内斯（David Martinez）祝贺该银行在与西班牙对外银行（BBVA SA）的收购战中获胜，显然是想把与萨瓦德尔银行领导层的公开争吵抛诸脑后。【原文：Banco Sabadell SA shareholder David Martinez congratulated the lender on winning its battle against BBVA SA’s takeover effort, apparently seeking to put a public spat with Sabadell’s leadership behind him.】

item.title: 印度推动扩大与主要贸易伙伴的卢比结算范围
item.description: 一位熟知内情的人士说，印度央行正在采取积极措施，允许自由贸易伙伴更方便地用卢比与印度进行交易结算，此举可能有助于随着时间的推移提振本币。【原文：India’s central bank is taking active steps to allow free-trade partners to settle transactions with it more easily in the rupee, a person familiar with the matter said, a move that could help boost the local currency over time.】

item.title: 蒂森克虏伯分拆的造船公司 TKMS 在德国首次亮相即大涨
item.description: 在欧洲国防热潮中，蒂森克虏伯公司（Thyssenkrupp AG）将这家海洋防务公司剥离出来，潜艇制造商 TKMS 的股票在周一的法兰克福首次交易中大涨。【原文：Shares of submarine-builder TKMS surged in their Frankfurt trading debut on Monday, after the marine defense company was carved-out of Thyssenkrupp AG amid Europe’s defense boom.】

item.title: 达喀尔筹资谈判继续进行，塞内加尔寻求迅速达成国际货币基金组织协议
item.description: 本周，塞内加尔继续在达喀尔与国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）的一个多边贷款人代表团举行会谈。【原文：Senegal intends to rapidly conclude a new International Monetary Fund program as talks continue with a delegation from the multilateral lender in Dakar this week.】

item.title: 首席财务官下台，B&M 因成本未达预期再次下调指导性目标
item.description: B&M European Value Retail SA 在发布利润预警仅两周后，再次下调了指导性目标，原因是发现了之前在展望中未计算在内的运费成本。【原文：B&M European Value Retail SA cut its guidance again just two weeks after issuing a profit warning, following the identification of freight costs that were previously unaccounted for in the outlook.】

item.title: 日本央行董事会鹰派人士呼吁加息，因为日本价格标准发生变化
item.description: 日本央行董事会成员高田恒指（Hajime Takata）表示，上调该行政策利率的时机已经成熟，他在上个月对维持政策稳定的决定提出异议后，超越了政治不稳定因素，重申了自己的信念。【原文：Bank of Japan Board Member Hajime Takata said the time is ripe for raising the bank’s policy interest rate, looking past political instability to reiterate his conviction after he dissented from a decision to hold policy steady last month.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数有望加入欧洲股市反弹行列
Nexperia 中国分公司称员工可对抗荷兰总部
item.description: 芯片制造商 Nexperia 的中国分公司表示，公司将继续正常运营，员工应听从当地领导的指导，这凸显了荷兰政府查封该公司后与荷兰总部之间的紧张关系。【原文：The Chinese unit of chipmaker Nexperia said operations continue as normal and employees should follow the guidance of local leadership, highlighting tensions with the Dutch headquarters after the Netherlands government’s seizure of the company.】

item.title: 贸易摩擦缓解，新兴市场股市创四年新高
item.description: 受中美贸易紧张局势缓和迹象的推动，新兴市场股市涨至四年多来的最高点。【原文：Emerging-market stocks rallied to their highest in more than four years, fueled by signs of easing US-China trade tensions.】

item.title: 高盛和 Citadel 首席执行官将出席香港 11 月峰会
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc）和摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）的首席执行官将出席香港举行的全球金融领袖年度峰会，而此时中美紧张局势重燃，一系列信贷损失给全球银行带来压力。【原文：The chief executive officers at Goldman Sachs Group Inc. and Morgan Stanley are slotted to attend Hong Kong’s annual summit for global finance leaders, just as US-China tensions reignite and a slew of credit losses weigh on global banks.】

item.title: 从蟑螂到克劳索
item.description:
市场正在对隐藏在众目睽睽之下的信贷问题进行数据侦查。【原文：

Markets are playing data detective for a pair of credit problems hiding in plain sight.

】

item.title: 澳大利亚顶级养老基金承诺为英国住房投资 5 亿英镑
item.description: 澳大利亚最大的养老基金 AustralianSuper 已投入 5 亿英镑（6.72 亿美元）启动英国住房投资平台，这是其扩大英国资产投资组合的一部分。【原文：AustralianSuper, the country’s largest pension fund, has committed an initial £500 million ($672 million) to launch an investment platform for UK housing, part of a drive to expand its portfolio of British assets.】

item.title: 据说大亨盖明德正在考虑出售亚洲业务
item.description: 据知情人士透露，澳大利亚大亨拉斐尔-杰明德（Raphael Geminder）正在考虑出售旗下包装公司在亚洲的业务。【原文：Australian tycoon Raphael Geminder is considering selling the Asian operations of his packaging companies, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 贸易紧张局势缓解，中国经济前景看好，铜价攀升
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普寻求缓解与中国的贸易紧张局势，而中国政府也表示其经济可以实现今年的增长目标之后，铜价上涨了 1%以上。【原文：Copper advanced more than 1% after US President Donald Trump sought to ease trade tensions with China, while Beijing signaled its economy can meet growth targets for this year.】

item.title: 韩国称美国关税谈判取得 "实质性进展
item.description: 韩国最高政策负责人表示，韩国在与美国的关税谈判中就大多数关键问题取得了 "实质性进展"，在此之前的一个周末，首尔的顶级富豪们还参加了唐纳德-特朗普在其马阿拉歌庄园举行的高尔夫活动。【原文：South Korea’s top policy chief said the country made “substantial progress” on most key issues in tariff talks with the US, following a weekend of meetings that also saw Seoul’s top tycoons attend a golf event with Donald Trump at his Mar-a-Lago estate.】

item.title: 供应商遭网络攻击后，MUJI 零售商关闭在线网站
item.description: 无印良品（Muji）品牌零售商 Ryohin Keikaku Co.【原文：Muji-brand retailer Ryohin Keikaku Co. suspended its e-commerce site late Sunday after its logistics supplier Askul Corp. was hit by a cyber attack.】
